wrote:
>
> Hi
> 
> I'm just exploring=
 JUnit4 for our project.
> 
> What we like to do is to distinguish between =
integration tests, unit
> tests and database tests. Therefor I'm using JUni=
tExt
> (http://junitext.sourceforge.net/) categories to annotate my tests.
=
> 
> Now my question is, how I create suites where I can apply a certain
> =
filter. Looking for documentation I always ended up with the example
> with=
 @RunWith(Suite.class).
>

ng Eclipse-Plugins, we would like to stick

andard run-configurations.
